text: Zenyatta Mondatta (stylised as Zenyatt√† Mondatta on the album cover artwork) is the third studio album by English band The Police and released on 3 October, 1980 through A&M; Records. It went to number 1 in the United Kingdom and Australia, number 2 in Canada, the Netherlands and Italy, number 3 in New Zealand and number 5 in Germany and the United States. The album went on to win 2 Grammy Awards. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1980 albums Category:The Police albums
title: Zenyatta Mondatta
